channel.description: Recent content in Procol Harum on Music

item.title: Procol Harum - A WHITER SHADE OF PALE
item.description:
We skipped
the light fandango
And turned cartwheels
cross the floor—
I was feeling
kind of seasick
But the crowd
called out for more
The room was
humming harder-
And the ceiling
flew away-
When we called out
for another drink—
The waiter brought
a tray-
As so it was
that later——
As the miller
told his tale
That her face
at first just ghostly
Turned a whiter—
shade of pale–

She said
there is no reason-
And the truth is
plain to see-
But I wondered through
my playing cards
And would not
let her be–
One of sixteen
vestal virgins
Who were leaving
for the coast
And although
my eyes– open
They might just
have well been closed
And so it was-
that later—–
As the miller told
his tale
That her face at first
just ghostly
Turned a whiter—
shade of pale–
